services_indiv.why: Why we do what we do?

individuals.main_title1: The modern world has brought comfort and progress—but also silent threats that erode physical and mental health. What are you doing today to protect yours?
individuals.main_title: I lead Blu to help people who are functional on the outside, but depleted underneath rebuild themselves—physical health, mental strength and clarity—so life regains purpose.
individuals.why: Why we do what we do :
individuals.whyp1: We help people who are suffering regain control of their body, mind, and life—so they can stand upright again and become reliable for themselves and for others.
individuals.whyp2: Blu is not theoretical. It is built on lived experience: losing clarity and energy, then rebuilding them through discipline, metabolic health, responsibility, and meaning.
individuals.whyp3: When a person collapses, their environment pays the price—spouse, children, teams, and friends. We help protect what matters most: family, responsibility, and legacy.

sections.title: what we do?
sections.leftText: Executive Metabolic Method™ for high performers and achievers. Performance, Discipline, and Purpose — The New Elite Code.
sections.rightDesc: Sustainable excellence begins within — through a profound balance of metabolism, mindset, and overall well-being. This understanding led us to dedicate our work to mentoring individuals who seek not just success, but alignment between body, mind, and purpose.

paragraphs.title: Restore Discipline & Purpose
paragraphs.text: If you’re a high achiever who feels exhausted behind success, we help you restore discipline, energy, and purpose. Our holistic, evidence-based approach integrates metabolic health, mindset, and leadership principles—so performance and balance can coexist. Leaders don’t burn out — they rebuild. Restore your energy, confidence, and clarity — privately and permanently.

lists.title: What we work on with you:
We address:
items: Entrepreneurs, investors, and independent professionals seeking high performance and well-being.
Executives and corporate leaders in mid- to large-sized companies.
Professionals, elite performers and athletes open to science-backed mental and metabolic optimization.

sections.title: How we do?
sections.leftText: Our approach blends strategic clarity with human depth, guiding you through a journey of transformation built on self-discipline, inner strength, and optimal metabolic health.
sections.rightDesc: Through personalized, one-on-one sessions and ongoing follow-up, we guide you in creating sustainable habits and systems that support your nutrition, physical activity, and mindset.

paragraphs.title: The Metabolic Method™
paragraphs.text: Our Metabolic Method™ is designed to restore your energy, focus, and drive, helping you reconnect with yourself. We work closely with you to set clear priorities and targets, ensuring your growth is both measurable and meaningful. With the support of our trusted partners when needed, we help you embrace metabolic health and mindset as the new currency of leadership, empowering you to perform at your best in every area of life.

sections.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
sections.button: Learn more about our Privacy & Confidentiality Policy
sections.leftText: Our work takes place in private, in-person sessions, where privacy and confidentiality are fundamental.
sections.rightDesc: At Blu., we deeply respect your privacy. Everything you share with us stays strictly confidential.

paragraphs.title: Confidentiality
paragraphs.text: We never disclose personal details, and your information is used only to support your wellness journey.

paragraphs.title: Discretion
paragraphs.text: You can trust us to protect your personal life with the utmost care and discretion.

paragraphs.title: Data Protection
paragraphs.text: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. Any information you choose to share with us is handled with care, discretion, and confidentiality, and processed only for legitimate, clearly defined purposes related to our professional services.

paragraphs.title: Security Measures
paragraphs.text: We do not disclose personal data to third parties without a valid legal basis, and we apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to safeguard your information against unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.

paragraphs.title: GDPR Compliance
paragraphs.text: Your personal data is processed in accordance with European Union data protection regulations (GDPR) and applicable confidentiality obligations. You may exercise your data protection rights at any time, in line with applicable law.

last.title: Discover Your Starting Point
last.description: Take a few minutes to explore either your personal capacity or your metabolic balance — and gain immediate personal insight.

card1.title: Personal Capacity Assessment
card1.desc: Privacy Notice: This test is anonymous. No personal data is stored. Only aggregated, anonymized statistics may be used for analytical purposes, in compliance with data protection regulations.

card2.title: Metabolic Health Test
card2.desc: Privacy Notice: This test is anonymous. No personal data is stored. Only aggregated, anonymized statistics may be used for analytical purposes, in compliance with data protection regulations.

footer.headline:
Elevating performance through
balance, clarity, and growth.

about.paragraph1: With over 21 years of experience in demanding environments — including 15 years in leadership positions — Redha evolved at a high level while facing real personal challenges: being overweight, low energy, concentration issues, and multiple metabolic imbalances.
about.paragraph2: Through his own journey of transformation, he gradually regained sustainable energy, profound mental clarity, and a more stable, aligned discipline.

sections2.title: Governance
sections2.leftText: We design modern governance architecture that improve accountability, transparency, and decision-making while supporting performance.
sections2.rightDesc: We support boards and executive teams in building modern governance systems that balance control, speed, and accountability. Governance becomes a performance enabler, not a bureaucratic constraint.

paragraphs.title: Transparency as a Decision-Making Tool
paragraphs.text: We implement transparency as a management system. Clear metrics, powerful KPI’s, shared financial understanding, and fact-based dialogue that improve decision quality, trust, and execution speed across the organization.

paragraphs.title: Alignment & Decision Architecture
paragraphs.text: We ensure that policies, codes of conduct, processes, procedures, approval mechanisms, and internal communication flows are coherent, practical, and fully aligned with the company’s vision, mission, and strategy.

We help define how decisions are made with where the company is going. Decision rights, escalation paths, and approval mechanisms are clarified so governance enables speed, accountability, and strategic focus instead of friction.

sections2.title: Financial Performance & Value Creation
sections2.leftText: We help leaders understand, measure, and improve what truly drives financial performance. By connecting strategy, operations, and capital discipline, we enable sustainable profitable growth and value creation for shareholders.
sections2.rightDesc: We support organizations in growing profitably over time, not just fast. We align growth ambitions with cash generation, capital efficiency, and risk management to ensure performance is durable and scalable.

paragraphs.title: Value Creation
paragraphs.text: We focus on what drives returns to shareholders; execution and capital allocation are aligned to create value.
By clarifying what truly creates value in your business, we connect strategy, operations, and financial outcomes so leaders focus resources on activities that really matter.

paragraphs.title: Financial Literacy for Executives
paragraphs.text: We help leaders truly understand how financial mechanics drive performance.

sections2.title: Business
sections2.leftText: We turn strategy into execution by improving efficiency, positioning, pricing, sales effectiveness, and digital capabilities.
sections2.rightDesc: We help leaders define a clear strategic direction and translate vision into concrete priorities that guide daily decisions.

paragraphs.title: Efficiency & Operational Focus
paragraphs.text: We identify inefficiencies that erode margin and energy. Efficiency becomes a lever for both profitability and organizational resilience.

paragraphs.title: Positioning & Power of Pricing
paragraphs.text: We strengthen pricing logic to ensure organizations capture the value they create, reduce unnecessary discounting, and improve margin sustainability.

paragraphs.title: Customer Focus
paragraphs.text: We sharpen market positioning around real customer value. A customer-focused organization makes clearer decisions and competes more effectively.

sections2.title: Leadership & Human Systems
sections2.leftText: We work with leaders to build effective organizations where people perform, learn, and take responsibility. Leadership, culture, and human systems are treated as core performance drivers, not soft topics.
sections2.rightDesc: We help leaders develop clarity, responsibility, and consistency. Leadership becomes visible in behavior and decisions, not titles.

paragraphs.title: Effective Organizations
paragraphs.text: We design organizations with clear roles, decision rights, and accountability to reduce friction and improve execution.

paragraphs.title: Psychological Safety
paragraphs.text: We help leaders create environments where people speak up, learn fast, and address problems early—without lowering standards.

paragraphs.title: Strong Internal Culture
paragraphs.text: We treat culture as a system of daily behaviors. A strong internal culture drives execution, innovation, and resilience.

sections2.title: Organizational Change & Operational Excellence
sections2.leftText: We help organizations evolve continuously in complex environments. By strengthening resilience, fast learning, and execution discipline, we enable change that improves performance rather than disrupting it.
sections2.rightDesc: We approach change primarily as a shift in thinking, not structure. Sustainable change happens when people understand and internalize new mental models.

paragraphs.title: Modern Organizations (LEAN / Agile)
paragraphs.text: We implement LEAN and Agile where they create value, improving speed, quality, and learning without dogmatism.

paragraphs.title: Fast Learning Organizations
paragraphs.text: We help organizations learn faster than their environment through feedback loops, experimentation, and disciplined execution.

paragraphs.title: Trial and Error as a System
paragraphs.text: We design controlled experimentation systems that allow teams to test, learn, and improve without increasing risk.

sections2.title: Organizational Training
sections2.leftText: We deliver targeted competence development for executives and managers to strengthen decision-making, resilience, execution discipline, and value creation in complex environments.
sections2.rightDesc: We provide tailored executive education and practical knowledge to top executives and managers facing high-stakes decisions and transformation.

paragraphs.text: We strengthen your ability to plan, adapt, and execute by supporting process excellence and disciplined delivery—on time, on budget, and on target.
We help leaders better assess business potential and identify innovative, efficient ways to create value.
Through customized solutions and interactive training programs, we enable your people to master what truly matters.

lists.title: Main Training Courses:
items: Financial acumen (P&L, Balance Sheet, OVA, ROCE)

sections2.title: Coaching & Mentoring Programs for Executives
sections2.leftText: Powered by the Executive Metabolic Method™, this program supports executives under sustained pressure in restoring energy, focus, and decision quality while strengthening leadership presence and execution discipline.
sections2.rightDesc: Our approach integrates metabolic performance, mindset, and leadership to deliver clarity and resilience where it matters most—at the personal and professional level.

paragraphs.text: This program supports executives under sustained pressure in restoring energy, focus, and decision quality while strengthening leadership presence.
All work is conducted through private, face-to-face sessions. Privacy and strict confidentiality are fundamental.

intro.subtitle: What do we do at Blu.:.
intro.title1: Organizations engage Blu to restore alignment, decision clarity, and execution coherence.
intro.title: We help leaders and executive boards create sustainable, profitable growth by focusing on what truly drives value: clear strategy and vision, efficient organizations, psychological safety, and disciplined execution. We bring financial clarity, transparent decision-making, and a growth mindset to organizations seeking value creation, adaptability, and long-term performance in a changing world

step1.title: Design
step1.desc: Our process begins with the design phase, where we focus on in-depth analysis and shared reflection. This collaborative approach allows us to clearly define objectives, align on targets, and set strategic directions that guide the project forward with clarity and purpose.

step2.title: Train
step2.desc: We align vision, mission, and strategy while defining clear targets and objectives. Through cognitive tools, systems architecture, and change management, we encourage reflection, feedback, and long-term commitment.

step3.title: Execute
step3.desc: We ensure continuous follow-up through reflection and corrective measures, identifying next steps and driving future improvements.

form.error_send: Failed to send message. Try again.
form.error_email: Please enter a valid email address.

hero.title: Not everyone should join us. And that is intentional.
hero.p1: Blu partners with experienced professionals who understand that sustained health, performance, and decision-making require structure, discipline, and professional accountability — not trends or shortcuts.
hero.p2: If you are committed to verifiable results, long-term responsibility, and ethical practice, you may belong here.

partners_section.title: We collaborate with experienced professionals who want to expand their impact without compromising their standards:
partners_section.card_label3: Certified Sports Coaches, Physical & Performance Trainers

why_blu.title: This is not a referral scheme. It's a professional collaboration.
why_blu.label: As a partner, you gain:
list: A structured working environment aligned with professional standards
Access to cross-disciplinary peers operating under clear boundaries
Professional alignment with a serious, selective platform
The ability to contribute meaningfully in complex, high-responsibility cases
Long-term professional value, not transactional engagement

standards.label: We work only with professionals who:
list: Accept personal accountability for their role and decisions
Respect competence boundaries and scope of practice
Operate with confidentiality, discretion, and ethical rigor
Are willing to be evaluated and held to high standards
standards.footer: If that resonates, we should talk.

cta.text: If you believe your expertise belongs in a serious, disciplined, and purpose-driven alliance, we invite you to apply.
cta.button: Apply to Become a Blu. Partner

test.please_answer_all: Please answer all questions before proceeding.

test1: This test is not about your potential — it’s about how your mind is functioning right now.
You’ll assess the core aspects of your current mental functioning.
Answer based on your current behavior, not your intentions. This should only take about 5 minutes of your time.
Privacy Notice: This test is anonymous. No personal data is stored. Only aggregated, anonymized statistics may be used for analytical purposes, in compliance with data protection regulations.
test2: This test reveals what’s already in motion.
This should only take about 5 minutes of your time.
Privacy Notice: This test is anonymous. No personal data is stored. Only aggregated, anonymized statistics may be used for analytical purposes, in compliance with data protection regulations.

privacy2.contact_text: For any questions regarding privacy, confidentiality, or data protection:

1.title: 1. Privacy and confidentiality commitment
1.content: Blu. places the highest importance on the protection of privacy and the confidentiality of information entrusted to it. All personal data is handled with care, discretion, and strict confidentiality. Blu. does not engage in the sale or disclosure of personal data.

2.title: 2. Nature of services and limitation of scope
2.content: Blu. provides coaching and assessment services. These are coaching tools. They do not constitute medical advice, medical diagnosis, or clinical treatment.

3.title: 3. Assessment privacy and anonymity
list: Individual responses cannot be linked to an identifiable person
Only aggregated and anonymized statistical data may be used

4.title: 4. Personal data collection (outside assessments)
4.content: When an individual voluntarily contacts Blu., the following data may be collected:
list: A brief description of the request
4.footer: Individuals are requested not to provide detailed medical information.

9.title: 9. Legal basis and regulatory compliance
9.content: Data is processed in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and Algerian Law No. 18-07 of 10 June 2018.

partner_form.main_title: This form is used solely to assess professional eligibility and alignment for a potential partnership with Blu. Completion of this form does not constitute acceptance, endorsement, or contractual commitment.

intent.reason: Reason for Interest in Partnering with Blu
intent.reason_placeholder: (Max 150 words. Do not include patient, client, or identifiable third-party information).
intent.contribution_placeholder: Clinical, advisory, educational, strategic, other — short description

compliance.title: Confidentiality & Ethical Compliance
compliance.confirm: By submitting this form, you confirm that:
checks: You operate within your licensed scope of practice and professional competence
You will not disclose patient, client, or sensitive third-party data in this application
You respect confidentiality, professional secrecy, and ethical obligations
You understand that any future collaboration is subject to formal review and agreement

gdpr.title: Data Protection & GDPR Information
gdpr.retention_val: Personal data will be retained only for the duration necessary to evaluate the application.
gdpr.check_accurate: I confirm that the information provided is accurate and professional
gdpr.check_consent: I consent to the processing of my data
gdpr.check_privacy: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy. I consent to having my data processed to respond to my inquiry.

privacy_section.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
privacy_section.main_text: At Blu., we deeply respect your privacy. Everything you share with us stays strictly confidential. We never disclose personal details, and your information is used only to support your wellness journey. You can trust us to protect your personal life with the utmost care and discretion.
privacy_section.paragraph1: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. Any information you choose to share with us is handled with care, discretion, and confidentiality, and processed only for legitimate, clearly defined purposes related to our professional services.
privacy_section.paragraph2: We do not disclose personal data to third parties without a valid legal basis, and we apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to safeguard your information against unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.
privacy_section.paragraph3: Your personal data is processed in accordance with European Union data protection regulations (GDPR) and applicable confidentiality obligations. You may exercise your data protection rights at any time, in line with applicable law.
privacy_section.link_more: Learn more about our Privacy & Confidentiality Policy
